oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Practical pharmacology for the new graduate
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Wagner, Sarah
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: antimicrobial
drug
therapy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: New veterinary graduates can be helped by guidance for theraÂ­peutic decision-making when using antimicrobial drugs in bovine practice. Aspects to be considered include empirical therapy in the absence of a definitive diagnosis, governmental regulations, client compliance, therapeutic indications, cost, food safety, and extra-label drug administration.
